content: X-EW10H P10 Threaded studs Carbon steel threaded stud for use with powder actuated nailers on steel (10 mm washer) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy-to-use, cordless system – up to 10 times quicker than drilling and with less vibration Thermo-pulled, entirely knurled shank – engineered for more reliable fastening in steel Applications Threaded connections (e.g. for channels, pipe rings) on steel Threaded connections (e.g. for brackets, electrical boxes) on steel Threaded connections (e.g. for miscellaneous attachments) on steel For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 1/4 in Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Steel | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 1/4 in | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Point type | Ballistic point, knurled | Approvals | ABS, LR | For use with (tools) | DX 600N | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 271985 - Threaded stud X-EW10H-30-14 P10 - Package Size 100 pc
